Wraps MySpace's PortableContacts REST API.

Constructor Detail

PortableContacts

public PortableContacts(SecurityContext securityContext)
Creates a wrapper object for the MySpace PortableContacts API. Note that this requires a context that contains an authorized user, e.g., OffsiteContext.

Parameters:
securityContext - The security context to use
